notificationMessage: Are you willing to receive notifications when it's time to pray?

🏙 Fajr $fajr

🌉 Maghrib $maghrib
🌃 Isha $isha

 إِنَّ الصَّلَاةَ كَانَتْ عَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ كِتَابًا مَوْقُوتًا                     

Indeed, prayer has been decreed upon the believers a decree of specified times.

Surah Nisa 103 verse
fastingMessage: Do you agree to be alerted during fasting and breaking the fast?

shareMessage: Share this bot with your loved ones and be a reason for them to pray on time

shareBot: Hello. Dear user, if you find this bot useful, please don't forget to share it with your loved ones
